title.narrative: All sectors of society at the local communities, national and the regional levels have a strong, well-coordinated collective capacity to reject and resist violent extremist ideologies to minimize the number of individuals whom terrorists can radicalize an

description.narrative: In 2022, the number of terrorist attack incidents is reduced by 24 % compared to the 2018 baseline number of attacks.

title.narrative: Output 1.1: ICEPCVE to enable target groups to implement initiatives aligned with the IGAD Regional P/CVE Strategy. The CSO Hub and the regional researcher’s network will coordinate implementation of initiatives by non-state actors.

description.narrative: The CSO Network, the Youth Network, and the Women’s Organisation Network are active and increase their number of enrolled members with 158 in total per year.

title.narrative: Output 2.2: ICEPCVE to enable target groups to effectively apply best practices, including gender and conflict-sensitive tools and methodologies, in their preventative work and strategies.

description.narrative: The ICEPCVE convene 6 learning visits for state representatives with 15 participants per learning visit.
